AFPPD sponsored travel to Manila to attend + present paper at 10th Women Ministers and Parliamentarians Conference. Airfares SYD-MANILA + Return, 5th + 8th Sept. Accomodation and hospitality during Conference.

Official government travel to New York to attend and participate in 69th United Nations General Assembly. Business class return airfare Melbourne to New York with Qantas was upgraded to first class on the outbound and inbound journeys

European Parliamentary Forum on Population Development sponsored travel to present at the G7/G20 "She Matters" Conference in Berlin. Return economy airfare and conference accommodation 16-17 April 2015

Travel to Morocco as Chair of the Australia Morocco Parliamentary Friendship Group. Government of Morocco provided return business airfares, accommodation, and ground transport for the period 5-14 June 2015

disclosures.entity: Pacific Friends of the Global Fund
disclosures.details: Travel to Vietnam to see how our foreign aid is supporting the Global Fund to fight against tuberculosis, malaria and HIV/AIDS. Pacific Friends of the Global Fund provided return business airfares, accommodation and ground transport for the period 28 June -5 July.

disclosures.details: Travel to Taiwan, Taipei Economic and Cultural office in Australia provided business class airfares, ground transport and accommodation 27 August – 2 September 2015

Travel to Azerbaijan as a member of the Australia-Azerbaijan Parliamentary Friendship Group. Government of Azerbaijan provided return business airfares, accommodation, and ground transport for the period 26 October – 3 November 2015
Travel to attend 11th Annual General Assembly of Asian Forum of Parliamentarians on Population Development in Bangkok. Economy class airfares, ground transport and accommodation 9-12 October 2015
